title: Ticket #6630: Fix schedd's slot splitting to handle custom resources
description:
When the schedd morphs a pslot into a dslot at claim time, it doesn't handle any custom resources defined by the pslot. This causes problems if any of the schedd's jobs request those resources.

This ticket makes a minimal change in the schedd to address this problem. These are some better solutions will have to wait until a future development release:

  • Consolidate code that manipulates pslot and dslot resource counts.
  • Have the startd send the real dslot ad to the schedd at claim time.
